title: League of Legends Pop! vinyl figures incoming!

{{champion:61}} Pop Or feed
Riot it would be nice of you to make a {{champion:103}} anything if you do i promise ill buy it may even buy two <3
another day i see bs like no {{champion:103}}  merch
omfg!! NEED A {{champion:119}} ONE BADLY!!!!
Only if there was a {{champion:90}} pop with voidlings
Where is {{champion:103}} pop?
Where are the midlaners? :( {{champion:105}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:238}}
why not a {{champion:17}} hes already small enough
If there was a {{item:3512}} pop vinyl with the little voidling popping out. There goes my wallet.
ohh yes ur on to something
Umm what about the collectors box with the {{champion:32}} pop? Will we be getting this as well in OCE?
It's not available at the moment. But eventually it will be up in our region.
6 months later...

Releasing it later means that people have to either hope that the other 6 stay in stock, then pre-order the amumu, or pay postage for two separate transactions.

Any chance you could set something up with EB Games so that they can make Amumu available for pre-order now and dispatch all 7 items when the Amumu collector's box becomes available?

Already pre-ordered all 6, so this doesn't apply to me anyway. Just an idea.

I love Pop! Vinyl and was furious when Riot completely overlooked releasing their figurines through Funko instead of making those dodgy ones.

This is really cute! I hope I can get the {{champion:412}} pop figures for my boyfriend and {{champion:222}} for myself. It'll be like our own little lane. Will there be more figures of more champions coming out?
Can you make some more other Pop! Funko characters?? {{champion:103}}
{{champion:498}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:76}}

The Shadow isles please, that is what i'm waiting for {{champion:120}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:57}}  and more

hate to be a downer but..... does anyone else think these are all ugly???? {{champion:64}} is ok and {{champion:201}} is passable, but the rest of them look like some sort of bug/lizard/human hybrid. By the look of the comments it seems like I'm the only one who thinks this :/. i was super hyped waiting for League to have some of these POP figure i see everywhere in stores, but this was just kind of a let down. :(
dude you only like {{champion:64}} and {{champion:201}}  because they have their eyes closed or blind folded
{{champion:101}}  anybody? Just me, ok.
lmaooo {{champion:267}} is being left out too, we can cry together

st

Why is Jinx and Vi always on those figures? Like at least open up a variety of champions to display like Annie, Katarina or even Draven. Plz rito we need a bigger champion pool.

Why can't we get the Amumu bundle? I just ordered the other six, but it seems Australia misses out on the LE Amumu bundle. Thing is, too, if I don't pre-order it'll be months before I can get my hands on them but if I pre-order, and the Amumu bundle comes out later I have to fork out an extra $10 for shipping.
